fragment.desc: Plaid patterns

fragment.desc: This fractal is created from Newton's Method in the complex plane

fragment.title: Triangle Tiles
fragment.desc: A random, symmetric tiling of triangles

fragment.title: Warped Space
fragment.desc: Take a grid of circles and warp it randomly

fragment.title: Spirals
fragment.desc: Logarithmic spirals.

fragment.title: Normal Map
fragment.desc: Normal maps encode surface detail in a flat texture. They are used for adding artificial detail to 3D models without changing the geometry

fragment.title: Wheat
fragment.desc: This pattern was loosely inspired by the shape of blades of wheat

fragment.title: Nested Voronoi Diagram
fragment.desc: Cells within Cells...

fragment.title: Mandelbrot Set 1
fragment.desc: The Mandelbrot Set is a type of fractal

fragment.title: Julia Set
fragment.desc: The Julia set is closely related to the Mandelbrot Set

fragment.title: Voronoi Doodle
fragment.desc: This pattern is inspired by my fountain pen doodles, which are in turn inspired by the Zentangle Method.

fragment.title: Invisible Ink
fragment.desc: This is a simulation of invisible ink under a black light

fragment.title: Googly Eyes
fragment.desc: You're being watched...

fragment.title: Liquid Metal
fragment.desc: An experiment with Fractal Brownian Motion

fragment.title: Mandala
fragment.desc: Patterns in polar coordinates

fragment.title: Shell
fragment.desc: the regions of this one remind me of a nautilus shell except circular instead of a spiral

fragment.title: Kaleidoscope
fragment.desc: Mirrors everywhere.

fragment.title: Newton Traditional Coloring
fragment.desc: Traditionally, you color the fractal by which root was reached. This is an example of this with a twist.

fragment.title: Newton Iteration
fragment.desc: This uses my original idea for coloring

fragment.title: Newton Pop Art
fragment.desc: This colors each region a flat color for a pop-art effect

fragment.title: Mandelbrot Fractal 2
fragment.desc: This is the mandelbrot with cosine coloring

fragment.title: Mandelbrot Fractal 3
fragment.desc: This is the Mandelbrot set except the colors are animated
